TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAuthorServices

Docs.summary: Defines services for authoring JScript code in an editor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.JScript.IParseText GetCodeSense() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a class, gets an object that is used to add IntelliSense to text when JScript code is being authored in an editor.
Docs.returns: An object that is used to add IntelliSense to text.
Docs.value: An object that is used to add IntelliSense to text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.JScript.IColorizeText GetColorizer() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a class, gets an object that is used to colorize text when JScript code is being authored in an editor.
Docs.returns: An object that is used to colorize text.
Docs.value: An object that is used to colorize text.
